resources.string: Scavenger is an app that connects sustainability and lifestyle oriented community members together. Users can either upload, edit, or delete project submissions of waste sites in need of clean up, near them. They can choose to add a description of the location/ materials, tag bottle refund programs as well as Personal Protective Equipment that may be needed. Users are incentivized to be more physically active, clean up their community and increase the market value of residential properties as they scavenge for reusable materials, earn points for each completed waste project, and redeem coupons for local businesses. Scavengers can also choose to make extra money by refunding certain materials to recycling depots (ex. alcohol bottles at The Beer Store)
